caption.p: The time dependence of the natural logarithm of the orientation time correlation function P1( t) for aqueous MgCl 2 solutions at different concentrations. ( A) Solutions without Mg 2+−Cl − contact ion pairing. ( B) Solutions with Mg 2+−Cl − contact ion pairing. ( C) Values of the first order orientational relaxation times, τ reor, as a function of the solution concentration.
